testimonial: Paul is the best manager I’ve ever had. He always takes time to listen and genuinely cares about you as a person. What sets him apart is that he doesn’t just listen, he actively helps you solve issues and empowers you to grow as a person through whatever challenges you’re facing.

Paul is the best manager I’ve ever had. He always takes time to listen and genuinely cares about you as a person. What sets him apart is that he doesn’t just listen, he actively helps you solve issues and empowers you to grow as a person through whatever challenges you’re facing.

I had the pleasure of working with Paul for 4 years at Liferay. He is as an exceptional team builder and strategist. Paul's self-discipline, lack of ego, and continuous growth impress peers. I learned a lot from him, and will always be appreciative of our time designing together. He maximizes resources effectively, proving immediate value. An asset to any team, Paul's hard work sets a top-tier example and brings out the best in others.

I’m so grateful to have had Paul as a manager, I learned a lot from him and so appreciate his supportive and caring nature. His quiet leadership style is a breath of fresh air and his focus on value over process is something I apply in my team.
Paul is one of the most well-rounded designers I’ve ever worked with. He’s incredibly curious and a natural empath. His ability to listen and create connections is second to none.
